name: Cool Bananas
description:
We pride ourselves on being a chilled and clean hostel with good vibes in a surfing paradise. Surrounded by many secluded beaches with spacious clean waves and sensational weather (even in winter times!)? Come and join the Bunch!

Cool Bananas is only 3 minute walk to the beach and 2 minute walk to the shops. ALL Rooms contain FREE LOCKERS. We have fast, unlimited WiFi in Main Common Room for our guests, as well as free tea and coffee available all day. FREE on-site parking as well as free shuttle to and from the Greyhound bus stop, with check-ins from as early as 6.30am. Be sure to look out for the 'dancing bananas' to greet you at the bus stop and shuttle you to the hostel.

Follow our Facebook page to find out about activities going on in the hostel, including Sunday Movie Night and vote for your favorite film.

How will you spend your time in Agnes Water? Reception can book various tours for you. Ask us about Surf Lessons! The starting point for Gnarly Tours Surfing! YEEEWWWW!!! also kayaking tours, bicycle hire, surf board hire, the beautiful bush walks and lookouts, trips to the Southern Great Barrier Reef. Moreover. There are also FREE WALKS including the Paperbark Forest, Red Rock Trail and the Discovery Trail with stunning sunsets and sunrises only 10 minutes walk from the hostel.


*Premier bus - 12.10am OR 2.15am - PRIVATE SHUTTLE COMPANY & REQUIRES 24 HR/PRE-BOOKING $80 FEE EACH WAY (or just book the greyhound for this bit of your trip because premier drops in in the middle of nowhere 40 kilometres from Agnes Water &1770)
*Greyhound bus  - NO NEED TO BOOK, LOOK FOR DANCING BANANAS and the DISCO SHUTTLE
* IF Driving - estimated time of arrival

48-hour cancellation policy.
Cancellation policy: 48h before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the full amount of your stay.
Check in from (if rooms are ready) 06:00 to 12:00 pm.
Check-in 5pm - 10:00 pm
Check out before 10:00 am
Payment upon booking by credit cards, debit cards. 
Taxes included.
No real curfew but noise kept down after 9pm.

Noise to be kept to a minimum after 9 pm

Come hang with our bunch ... hammocks supplied!

groupInformation.terms: 10pm ALL noise must stop. No loud music at ANY time. under 18's must have adults supervise

houseRules.notes:
*IF YOU ARE ARRIVING VIA BUS*

Premier bus:
Drop off is 40 kilometers from Agnes Water &1770, you will need to contact the local Agnes water taxi in advance to pick you up.

Greyhound bus:
We will be there to pick you guys up in the Gnarly tours truck! 


IF driving please confirm arrival time.

48-hour cancellation policy.
Cancellation policy: 48h before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the full price of your stay.
Check in from 5:00pm to 10:00pm
Check out before 10:00am
No curfew.

Please retain this for your reference
Prices are in AUD
